name: syncAllExchangesAndSymbols
description: Weekly foundation data sync - retrieves all available exchanges and their symbols from EODHD API. This is the foundation job that all other jobs depend on.
cronDescription: Every Saturday at 23:00 America/Chicago (11:00 PM CST/CDT)
dataSource: EODHD API - Exchanges and Symbols endpoints

name: syncFundamentalsLargeCap
description: Daily fundamentals data sync for large cap stocks (≥$1B market cap). Retrieves key financial metrics including market cap, P/E ratio, revenue, etc.

name: findAndMarkLargeCapStocks
displayName: Find and Mark Large Cap Stocks
description: Identifies and marks stocks with market cap ≥$1B as large cap stocks. This job filters the universe of stocks for focused analysis.
cronDescription: Daily at 01:30 America/Chicago (1:30 AM CST/CDT - 30 minutes after fundamentals)

name: syncDividendsLargeCap
description: Daily dividend data sync for large cap stocks. Retrieves historical dividend payments, ex-dividend dates, and dividend yield information.
cronDescription: Daily at 02:00 America/Chicago (2:00 AM CST/CDT - 30 minutes after large cap identification)

name: syncTechnicalsLargeCap
description: Monthly technical indicators sync for large cap stocks. Retrieves moving averages, RSI, MACD, and other technical analysis indicators. Runs on 1st of each month.
cronDescription: Monthly on 1st at 01:00 America/Chicago (1:00 AM CST/CDT)

name: syncMetricsLargeCap
description: Daily calculated financial metrics for large cap stocks. Calculates dividend growth rates (3Y, 5Y, 10Y), current dividend yield, and other derived metrics.
cronDescription: Daily at 03:30 America/Chicago (3:30 AM CST/CDT - 1.5 hours after dividends)

name: Sync Valuation Metrics (Large Cap)
description: Computes DCF-based valuation metrics for large-cap stocks using fundamentals and pricing data.

name: syncSectorPercentiles
description: Daily sector percentile calculation for large cap stocks. Calculates percentile ranks of each company's metrics relative to their sector peers. Replaces the deprecated syncMetricsPerSector job.
cronDescription: Daily at 04:00 America/Chicago (4:00 AM CST/CDT - 30 minutes after individual metrics)
dataSource: Metrics and Fundamentals collections (sector percentile calculation)

name: syncIndustryPercentiles
description: Daily industry percentile calculation for large cap stocks. Calculates percentile ranks of each company's metrics relative to their industry peers. Replaces the deprecated syncMetricsPerIndustry job.
cronDescription: Daily at 04:30 America/Chicago (4:30 AM CST/CDT - 30 minutes after sector percentiles)
dataSource: Metrics and Fundamentals collections (industry percentile calculation)
